敜字的基本解释

敜
niè
堵塞，封闭。

敜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niè］
［《廣韻》奴協切，入帖，泥。］
(1)填塞；掩蔽。
(2)捻。用手指搓转。
(3)引申为握持。参见“敜干敹甲”。

敜字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【攴字部】　敜； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页472第10
【廣韻】奴協切【集韻】諾叶切，?音捻。【說文】塞也。【書·費誓】敜乃穽。【傳】穽穿地陷獸，當以土窒敜之。　又【集韻】乃結切，音涅。按也。【玉篇】閉也。【說文】从攴作敜。敜字原从攴作。

敜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
敜字的起名意思

暂无。

cover up a hole
Basic explanation of words
cover up a hole
niè
Blocked, closed.
cover up a hole
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niè］
["Guangyun" Slave Xie cut, enter the post, mud. ]
(1) Packing; masking.
(2) Twist. Rub it with your fingers.
(3) Extended to hold. See "Wanganwanjia".
cover up a hole
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 2] [Department of Characters] 　敜; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 472 No. 10
[Guang Yun] Slave Xie cut [Ji Yun] Noye cut, sound twist. [Said the text] Sai Ye. [Book·Fei Oath] 敜 Nai 穽. [Biography] The beast should be suffocated by the earth if it goes through the ground and traps the beast.　[Jiyun] is knot cutting, sound nirvana. Press also. 【Jade articles】Closed too. 【Said the text】From the 攴作敜. The word 敜 was originally made from 攴.
